{"metadata":{"objective":"Answering the rebuttal","lastStepAudioPath":""},"steps":[{"headerText":"Your sister answers back","leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>You are</strong></span> mediating a family disagreement between your sister and her sons (your nephews) about how much they use their phones.&nbsp; In order to give her your best advice, you need to understand all sides of the issue.<strong>&nbsp; </strong>You have listened to your sister&#39;s argument and evidence and your nephews&#39; rebuttal.&nbsp;<br /><br />Now your sister needs to <strong>counter</strong> or <strong>argue against</strong> your nephews&#39; rebuttal.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Your next step</strong></span> is to understand what makes a good counter-rebuttal, and then listen to what your sister has to say.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Try it!</strong></span><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\"><tbody><tr><td><p><strong>Turn off the phone</strong></p><p>Your sister says, &quot;Family members should spend no more than two hours per day on their phones because this limit will give the family more time to spend together.&quot;</p><p>Your nephews disagree.</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","settings":{"showHeader":1,"showAudio":1,"audioPath":"","hideRightPanel":0,"showNext":1,"delayStep":"0","delayRight":"0","showRFB":0}},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>A <strong>counter-rebuttal</strong> attacks the rebuttal and <ins style=\"text-decoration:underline;\">supports</ins> the argument.&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows three stages of an argument: the argument, the rebuttal, and the counter-rebuttal.    In the argument stage, your sister makes her argument. In the rebuttal stage, your nephews attack the argument. In the counter-rebuttal stage, your sister attacks the rebuttal and supports the argument.   This mini-lesson is about the counter-rebuttal stage in which your sister attacks your nephews' rebuttal and provides more support for her own argument.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"How do you counter a rebuttal?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Here are three strategies you can use to counter a rebuttal:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>If the rebuttal is based on <strong>facts or data</strong>, point out flaws or gaps in the information.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the rebuttal is based on <strong>logic</strong>, attack the logic.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the rebuttal is based on <strong>expert opinion</strong>, try to discredit it.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Person A and Person B are having an argument about diets and healthy foods.&nbsp; Person A claims that a healthy diet should consist primarily of fruits and vegetables.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s factual evidence:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Fruits and vegetables are naturally fat free and help people maintain a healthy weight.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">People need to eat some fat to feel satisfied and prevent overeating.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging the <strong>facts</strong>?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_38765d0c-f3ba-d68e-e6bb-7ce57c2abf9d\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_3876...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s logical evidence:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">People in countries with low rates of obesity typically eat little or no meat.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">That may be true, but many of them suffer from malnutrition.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging its <strong>logic</strong>?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_5d4f6928-704a-846f-b2c4-8a55a80c7bf2\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_5d4f...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s expert opinion:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Dr. Capsicum, an expert in nutrition, notes that vegetarians typically have fewer health issues than carnivores (meat eaters). </span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">According to John Hosta, Professor of Nutrition at Mobo University, lean meat provides protein and important vitamins and minerals that are essential for good health.&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging or discrediting the <strong>expert opinion</strong>?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_d098d0e0-fcba-ace7-4c0d-837e5774fc74\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_d098...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>In the family controversy, your sister&#39;s first counter is to challenge her sons&#39; information or facts.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your sister&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Studies have shown that teenagers who spend excessive amounts of time on their phones tend to withdraw from family life and are subject to depression and anxiety.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your nephews&#39; rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Studies have confirmed that it is important for teenagers to develop lives outside the family.&nbsp;&nbsp; Maintaining friendships is essential for adolescents to develop into healthy adults.&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"How does your sister answer her sons' rebuttal?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can your sister use to challenge her sons&#39; information or facts?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_0e4a1ebe-7d00-193e-4ad1-5aa96e1d4e38\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_0e4a...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Next, your sister attacks her sons&#39; logic.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your sister&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Reliance on technology creates an addiction that diverts attention from other parts of life, such as developing conversational skills and focusing on homework.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your nephews&#39; rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Much communication, even in the workplace, now takes place electronically. Therefore, by using technology, we are actually developing important skills.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can your sister use to argue with her sons&#39; logic?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_bc64b663-bc5f-f654-8a53-919fb4c11de2\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_bc64...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your sister comes up with a way to either challenge or discredit your nephews&#39; expert opinions.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your sister&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Scientific research has shown that smart phones can negatively affect health&nbsp;by decreasing sleep quality and impairing eyesight.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From your nephews&#39; rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">According to the National Institutes of Health, recent studies have failed to identify any link between phone use and nearsightedness or insomnia.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can your sister use to rebut the expert opinions quoted by her sons?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_b53c9d2a-c9f5-6e5c-999a-b21db6173497\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_b53c...</strong></jumc><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Sometimes it is not possible to counter or argue against every point of a rebuttal.&nbsp; That is not a problem; the goal is to have an argument that is as strong as possible.<br /><br />For example, your sister could not counter this point from your nephews&#39; rebuttal:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">We eat dinner together as much as possible and we do a family activity together on the weekends. We already spend plenty of time together as a family!</span><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>An effective counter-rebuttal addresses as many weaknesses in the rebuttal as possible.&nbsp; It is possible to challenge the rebuttal&#39;s facts, logic, or expert opinion, or any other ways the rebuttal is weak.</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Your sister&#39;s counter-rebuttal:</span></p><p>Studies have also indicated that technology does not create or maintain rich or enduring relationships. Rather, much time spent online is wasted on shallow or meaningless conversation or gossip. Friends come and go, but family lasts forever.&nbsp; Also, while electronic communications are vital in today&rsquo;s workplace, there is no substitute for face-to-face skills.&nbsp; In a typical job, many workers must talk to real, live people face to face.&nbsp; Finally, according to a more recent study by Harvard Medical School scientists, using electronic devices including phones, especially at bedtime, may suppress the brain hormones that help us sleep.&nbsp;</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Putting it all together"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-powertip\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">Tip!</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Most arguments do not take place in a courtroom.&nbsp; A family conflict like this one illustrates the process of making an argument and defending it.&nbsp; So, when you make an argument, think about how another person could rebut what you are arguing.&nbsp; Answering this person with an effective counter-rebuttal will make your whole argument stronger. &nbsp;</td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_38765d0c-f3ba-d68e-e6bb-7ce57c2abf9d":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"People can get the fat they need from fruits and vegetables such as nuts and avocados.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":""},{"text":"There are many different types of fats, including trans-fats and saturated fats.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This statement does not address the rebuttal.  It is simply a factual statement."},{"fixed":false,"text":"I have been eating meat my entire life, and I am in good physical shape.","incFeedback":"Your personal experience or opinion, no matter how strong or relevant, is not a fact."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This answer to the rebuttal challenges a fact with good, relevant information.","prompt":""},"mc_5d4f6928-704a-846f-b2c4-8a55a80c7bf2":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"According to the United Nations World Food Programme, almost 13% of the world's population is undernourished.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is a statistic.  It does not attack the logic of the rebuttal."},{"text":"Countries whose populations have diets that are primarily based on plants and not meat can have low rates of obesity and low rates of malnutrition.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":""},{"fixed":false,"text":"Life is difficult enough as it is; we do not need doctors and government agencies trying to talk us out of eating the foods we like.","incFeedback":"This is an opinion and does not attack the logic of the rebuttal."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":1,"correctFeedback":"This is a good answer to the rebuttal. Most work is done at isolated workstations.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"Not only does this statement not challenge your nephews' logic, it is not logical itself.  Which statement makes good, logical sense?"},{"fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This statement attacks the people who made the rebuttal; it does not point to a flaw in their logic.","text":"My sons have never had a job and do not have the life experience to understand the needs of the workplace, so their reasoning is questionable and suspect."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This counter-rebuttal effectively makes the point that success in life depends on more than electronic communication skills."},"mc_b53c9d2a-c9f5-6e5c-999a-b21db6173497":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"According to a more recent study by Harvard Medical School scientists, using electronic devices including phones, especially at bedtime, may suppress the brain hormones that help us sleep.","fixed":false},{"text":"The National Institutes of Health, which is funded by our tax dollars, are staffed by old-fashioned people who have a definite political and social agenda.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is a personal attack. I also heard a report somewhere that 60 million Americans suffer from insomnia and other sleep disorders.","incFeedback":"We know nothing about who wrote the blog or report.  Therefore, we cannot know if his or her opinion is reliable.  Also, this statement focuses on insomnia in general, not on the health problems caused by smart phones."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This statement fairly uses respected authorities to respond to the experts quoted by your nephews."},"mc_0e4a1ebe-7d00-193e-4ad1-5aa96e1d4e38":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Studies have indicated that technology does not create or maintain rich or enduring relationships. Rather, much time spent online is wasted on shallow or meaningless conversation or gossip. Friends come and go, but family lasts forever.","fixed":false},{"text":"My sons are very concerned with their popularity, and they make many of their decisions based on what their peer groups think; I think they're too concerned with their social lives and not enough with their academic performance.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not challenging the facts.  This is an opinion."},{"fixed":false,"text":"I don't think there are any parents alive today, in any of the world's developed countries, who aren't concerned about the amount of time that their kids spend on electronic devices.","incFeedback":"This is not challenging the facts.  This is an opinion."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This is a strong counter-rebuttal because it shows that family relationships tend to last longer than friendships."}},"rightFloatText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-cktitle\" style=\"color:#025B5B;font-family:lato,sans-serif;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;\">Turn off the phone</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Your nephews&#39; rebuttal:</span></p><p>Studies have confirmed that it is important for teenagers to develop lives outside the family.&nbsp; Maintaining friendships is essential for adolescents to develop into healthy adults.&nbsp; Also, much of today&rsquo;s communication, even in the workplace, takes place electronically.&nbsp; Therefore, by using technology, people are actually developing important skills.&nbsp; According to the National Institutes of Health, recent studies have failed to identify any link between phone use and nearsightedness or insomnia.&nbsp; Finally, we eat dinner together as much as possible and we do a family activity together on the weekends.&nbsp; We already spend plenty of time together as a family!</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>"}
